title: Replace Mission mascot image with uploaded photo

requirements.text: Update the selected Mission Section mascot element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/img[1]) so it uses the user-uploaded photo instead of the current generated mascot image. Add the uploaded image file(s) to frontend/public/assets/generated and update only this image elementâ€™s src to reference the uploaded asset via the existing base-aware assetPath() helper.
acceptanceCriteria: The mascot image currently using assetPath('assets/generated/zen-mascot-logo.dim_512x512.png') is replaced to use assetPath('assets/generated/image-1.webp') (or assetPath('assets/generated/image-2.webp') if that is the intended replacement), without changing surrounding layout or other sections.

The uploaded image file used by the exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/.webp and loads correctly in both local dev and IC deployments served from a subpath (i.e., no hard-coded leading '/' in the src).
Only the selected element in the Mission section is changed (no other images on the page are modified).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep asset URLs base-aware (use assetPath) so the site works when hosted from '/' or a subpath.
nonGoals: Reworking page layout, typography, colors, or other sections beyond swapping the selected Mission mascot image.
Adding backend logic or storage for images.
